trans-unit.resname: C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of the Dire Hour
trans-unit.target: 厄时天使

trans-unit.resname: C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all attacking creatures.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则放逐所有进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She arrived like a meteorite, and the enemy fell in a shock wave of holy vengeance.
trans-unit.target: 她如流星般突现战场，随之降临的复仇圣击将敌人湮没殆尽。

trans-unit.resname: C14·2 | Angelic Field Marshal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angelic Field Marshal
trans-unit.target: 天使元帅

trans-unit.resname: C14·2 | Angelic Field Marshal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nLieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and creatures you control have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且由你操控的生物具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: C14·2 | Angelic Field Marshal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her presence on the battlefield can transform an unruly mob into a disciplined army.
trans-unit.target: 得她号令，就连难以驾驭的暴民都能成为纪律严明的军队。

trans-unit.source: Benevolent Offering
trans-unit.target: 善心乐施

trans-unit.resname: C14·3 | Benevolent Offering | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You and that player each put three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.\nChoose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你和该牌手各将三个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。 选择一位对手。你每操控一个生物，你便获得2点生命，且该牌手每操控一个生物，他便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Comeuppance
trans-unit.target: 自业自得

trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage from a creature source is prevented this way, CARDNAME deals that much damage to that creature. If damage from a noncreature source is prevented this way, CARDNAME deals that much damage to the source's controller.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止不由你操控的来源将对你和由你操控的鹏洛客造成的所有伤害。如果以此法防止了某个来源为生物的伤害，则CARDNAME对该生物造成等量的伤害。如果以此法防止了某个来源为非生物的伤害，则CARDNAME对该来源的操控者造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Containment Priest
trans-unit.target: 围护僧侣

trans-unit.resname: C14·5 | Containment Priest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nIf a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 如果某非衍生物的生物将进战场，且未有牌手施放之，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Some protection requires a bit of finesse.
trans-unit.target: 有些保护需要无微不至。

trans-unit.resname: C14·6 | Deploy to the Front | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deploy to the Front
trans-unit.target: 整装上阵

trans-unit.resname: C14·6 | Deploy to the Front | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物放进战场，X为战场上的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·6 | Deploy to the Front | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We will descend upon you like a plague of locusts to purge you from our lands!"\n—Hirov, commander of the Thousand Swords
trans-unit.target: 「我们的士兵将如驱之不尽的蝗虫一般倾泻战场，直至将你赶出我们的领地！」 ～千刃团指挥官希洛夫

trans-unit.resname: C14·7 | Fell the Mighty | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fell the Mighty
trans-unit.target: 以弱制强

trans-unit.resname: C14·7 | Fell the Mighty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有力量大于目标生物的生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·7 | Fell the Mighty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They had it coming."\n—Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick
trans-unit.target: 「他们罪有应得。」 ～蒂维克救星，扈从伊玛利亚

trans-unit.target: 圣洁灵卫

trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME死去时，将X个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场，X为你坟墓场中生物牌的数量。

trans-unit.source: Jazal Goldmane
trans-unit.target: 金鬃贾佐

trans-unit.resname: C14·9 | Jazal Goldmane | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\n{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 {3}{W}{W}：由你操控且进行攻击的生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为进行攻击的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: "As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations."\n—Ajani Goldmane
trans-unit.target: 「作为狮王，他是我的精神引领。作为兄长，他是我的志望所向。」 ～金鬃阿耶尼

trans-unit.source:
+2: Put a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. You may attach an Equipment you control to it.
−2: You may put an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
−10: Put a colorless Equipment artifact token named Stoneforged Blade onto the battlefield. It has indestructible, "Equipped creature gets +5/+5 and has double strike," and equip {0}.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +2：将一个1/1白色寇族／士兵衍生生物放进战场。你可以将一个由你操控的武具装备于其上。 −2：你可以将一张武具牌从你手上或坟墓场放进战场。 −10：将一个名称为锻石砾刃的无色武具衍生神器放进战场。它具有不灭，「佩带此武具的生物得+5/+5且具有连击异能」与佩带{0}。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.source: Aether Gale
trans-unit.target: 乙太狂风

trans-unit.resname: C14·11 | Aether Gale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将六个目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: The militia formed up in the central plaza awaiting the onslaught, but the giants never quite made it.
trans-unit.target: 义勇兵已在中心广场严阵以待，准备抵御巨人强大攻势，但敌人却从未出现。

trans-unit.source: Breaching Leviathan
trans-unit.target: 破浪海怪

trans-unit.resname: C14·12 | Breaching Leviathan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, tap all nonblue creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则横置所有非蓝色的生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: These waters remain uncharted, but not for lack of trying.
trans-unit.target: 这片水域虽已有无数有志者尝试勘绘，如今却仍未有任何标注。

trans-unit.source: Domineering Will
trans-unit.target: 意志霸揽

trans-unit.resname: C14·13 | Domineering Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player gains control of up to three target nonattacking creatures until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They block this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手获得至多三个目标非进行攻击之生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置这些生物。它们本回合若能进行阻挡，则必须如此作。

trans-unit.source: Dulcet Sirens
trans-unit.target: 悦曲塞连

trans-unit.resname: C14·14 | Dulcet Sirens | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Target creature attacks target opponent this turn if able.\nMorph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：目标生物本回合若能攻击目标对手，则必须如此作。 变身{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: What are the orders of a king or the demands of a creed next to such melodies?
trans-unit.target: 但闻如此美妙旋律，哪还理得了许多君命与教义？

trans-unit.source: Intellectual Offering
trans-unit.target: 智识乐施

trans-unit.resname: C14·15 | Intellectual Offering | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You and that player each draw three cards.\nChoose an opponent. Untap all nonland permanents you control and all nonland permanents that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你和该牌手各抓三张牌。 选择一位对手。重置由你操控的所有非地永久物和由该牌手操控的所有非地永久物。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, put a 3/3 blue Fish creature token onto the battlefield with "When this creature dies, put a 6/6 blue Whale creature token onto the battlefield with ‘\nWhen this creature dies, put a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token onto the battlefield.'"
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，将一个3/3蓝色的鱼衍生生物放进战场，且具有「当此生物死去时，将一个6/6蓝色鲸鱼衍生生物放进战场，且具有『当此生物死去时，将一个9/9蓝色巨海兽衍生生物放进战场』。」

trans-unit.source: Stitcher Geralf
trans-unit.target: 拼接师基拉夫

trans-unit.resname: C14·17 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Put an X/X blue Zombie creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：每位牌手各将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。放逐至多两张以此法置入坟墓场的生物牌。将一个X/X蓝色灵俑衍生生物放进战场，X为以此法放逐之牌力量的总和。

trans-unit.source: Stormsurge Kraken
trans-unit.target: 岚涛巨海兽

trans-unit.resname: C14·18 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hexproof\nLieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, you may draw two cards."
trans-unit.target: 辟邪 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且具有「每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，你可以抓两张牌。」

trans-unit.source: Most see krakens as wantonly violent, failing to notice their meticulous attention to detail when dismantling a vessel.
trans-unit.target: 许多人都认为巨海怪只会恣意施暴，却从未注意到它们破坏船舶时的细腻讲究。

trans-unit.resname: C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teferi, Temporal Archmage

trans-unit.resname: C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
−1: Untap up to four target permanents.
−10: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant."
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张置于你的牌库底。 −1：重置至多四个目标永久物。 −10：你获得具有「你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能」的徽记。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: C14·20 | Well of Ideas | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 灵感之井

trans-unit.resname: C14·20 | Well of Ideas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw two cards.\nAt the beginning of each other player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.\nAt the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓两张牌。 在其他每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手额外抓一张牌。 在你的抓牌步骤开始时，额外抓两张牌。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且具有「每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手牺牲一个生物。」

trans-unit.target: 威吓 {1}{B}，牺牲另一个生物：在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，将一个X/X黑色惊惧兽衍生生物放进战场，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.source: "Just a taste?"
trans-unit.target: 「来尝一口？」

trans-unit.target: 尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：将X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场，X为所牺牲之生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."
trans-unit.target: 「基拉夫，你非得喋喋不休吗？我什么都不同意。我要什么时候召唤食尸鬼，就什么时候召唤。」

trans-unit.source: Infernal Offering
trans-unit.target: 炼狱乐施

trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You and that player each sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way draws two cards.\nChoose an opponent. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then that player returns a creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你和该牌手各牺牲一个生物。每位以此法牺牲生物的牌手各抓两张牌。 选择一位对手。将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，然后该牌手将一张生物牌从他的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Malicious Affliction
trans-unit.target: 恶毒折磨

trans-unit.resname: C14·25 | Malicious Affliction | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Morbid — When you cast CARDNAME, if a creature died this turn, you may copy CARDNAME and may choose a new target for the copy.\nDestroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当你施放CARDNAME时，若本回合有生物死去，则你可以复制CARDNAME，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."\n—Byro, plague doctor
trans-unit.target: 「此类折磨之目的似乎是找出至纯生灵。」 ～瘟疫医士拜洛

trans-unit.target: 物尽天择

trans-unit.resname: C14·26 | Necromantic Selection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后将一张以此法置入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。它额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.
trans-unit.target: 残灰散尽，骨骸落定，它自混沌中蹒跚而出，饶是自身灭绝也未能惊动分毫。

trans-unit.source:
+2: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
−2: Put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. You lose 2 life.
−8: You get an emblem with "{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the sacrificed creature's power."

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature.\nWhenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以消灭目标生物。 每当一个由对手操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: Raving Dead

trans-unit.target: 死触 在你回合的战斗开始时，随机选择一位对手。CARDNAME本次战斗若能攻击该牌手，则必须如此作。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手失去一半数量的生命，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.source: "There are always leftovers."\n—Derecht, flesh carver

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose two players.\nIf a source controlled by one of the chosen players would deal damage to the other chosen player or a permanent that player controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择两位牌手。 如果由其中一位牌手操控的某个来源将对其中另一位牌手或由他操控的某个永久物造成伤害，则改为该来源对后者牌手或永久物造成两倍的伤害。

+2: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

trans-unit.source: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."
